resources.string: Enter your name, college, semester and year you are studying in and minimum percentage of attendance required

Enter the number of different subjects or classes you attend. This may include labs and other co-curricular classes for which you want to calculate your attendance. After this click \'Enter\'. \n Now enter the names of the various subjects you wish to enter.

Enter the number of working days in a week and the number of hours conducted everyday. Please enter the maximum number of hour held in a day as per your timetable this will help you in including extra classes taken later. Then press \'Enter\'. \n Enter your timetable of each day. Please enter this carefully and for all the days.
Enter your current attendance status for each subject.\nPress \'SUBMIT\' if you want all values as 0!

In this page you can view your attendance percentage of each subject individually. On clicking each of the subjects you can see how many hours you can bunk or how many classes you need to attend to stay above the minimum percentage requirement.

NOTE: This page needs to be updated everyday. 
 Enter the status of the classes of that day. 
 If you have multiple hours having a single attendance count, then add the status for only a single hour and mark the remaining hours as free. 
 'A' is for Attended, 'B' for Bunked, 'F' for Free. 
 You can choose which hour was taken from the left. 
 Please enter the status even if an hour is named 'Free'. The attendance for such hours will not be counted.
In this page you can navigate to a particular day for which you have entered your attendance and view the status of that day.
